message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and is worth $1200000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the importance it has to both of us, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price of $1300000. This offer is tailored to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.
